Title: Incredibles 2
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Sci-Fi
Actors: Craig T. Nelson, Holly Hunter, Sarah Vowell, Huck Milner
Plot: The Incredibles family takes on a new mission which involves a change in family roles: Bob Parr (Mr. Incredible) must manage the house while his wife Helen (Elastigirl) goes out to save the world.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 12 wins & 74 nominations.
Production: Walt Disney Pictures, Pixar Animation Studios
